tool.name: Blast and get matched sequences
tool.command: blastn -task blastn -db $genome -query $input -outfmt "7 std qlen slen qseq sseq" -num_threads 3 -word_size $word_size -num_alignments 50 -evalue $evalue -out genome_blast.txt

param.name: genome
param.label: BLAST library to search
param.help: Default is Chinese Spring IWGSC RefSeq V1.0

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
This is just a quick way to extract similar sequences for specific primer design.
------
For more information go to : https://github.com/pinbo/getprimer
